content.description: Climb flakes in a corner to a dirty hold then undercling up and over bulges with good stances, cracks for pro, & to the anchor.
content.protection: 2 bolts / 1 or 2 smaller-sized Aliens and/or some smaller to medium-sized wired nuts.
content.location: This is on the left side of outcrop. There's a direct start right under the corner, or an easier one coming in from the left.

content.description:
This uses the same start as

Alvin's Problem

but diagonals up and right after 1st bolt; over clean, hollow flakes to stance under roof and corners, continue right & turn last roof dihedral up to ledge and anchors. It is an airy route.
content.location:
Do the same start as

Alvin's Problem

.

content.description: Ascend white pockets right of a wide crack, past a bolt to a stance under roof crack. The crux is an overhanging flare with big holds on the insides and a finger crack at the back. Go up and over jugs to the anchor. Enjoy the nice belay perch.
content.location:
This is left of

Theo's Dish

.

content.description:
Surmount the roof start by using the edge right of

Chip n' Dale

up to a ledge and clean face, over chossy-looking, but actually very clean, bulges to wild moves past a Swiss cheese layer to the last bolt & anchors of

Chip n' Dale

.
content.location:
This is the 1st start right of

Chip n' Dale

.

content.description: Stand on boulder at base to reach two horizontals. Gain a ledge and move left into corner, then go back right on to perch and then up under a roof. Traverse right, and then go up on good holds and overhangs to the anchor.
content.protection: Bolts and 3 or 4 smaller-sized Aliens protect this route....

content.description:
There are two starts: nice, intermittent edges out right under overhang, reach for more positive holds, up to arete and triangle hold (hard) to top

or

as a lead route: start right of arÃªte up easier moves, and then go up easy bulges to anchor with pro to 3".
content.location:
Begin on overhanging face just right of

Theo's Dish

.

content.description: Stand on block at bottom to reach edges and then arete to the ledge, go up right for small wire to stance, move right to hollow flakes, and then go left off jugs onto an adequately cleaned poop-stance with bolt under the difficulties - bolts follow the right side of the groove on fantastic pockets / edges to anchor.
content.protection: Bolts, small hexes, and wired nuts.
content.location: This is the line under the middle set of anchors, just under the roof.
